title: Holiday Schedule Updates
body_md:
**Important Holiday Schedule Changes**

During the holiday season (Dec 24 - Jan 2), the following changes will apply:

- **Fitness Center**: Extended hours 6 AM - 11 PM
- **Pool**: Regular hours maintained
- **Community Room**: Available for holiday gatherings (advance booking required)
- **Maintenance**: Emergency services only on Dec 25 & Jan 1

Please plan accordingly and enjoy the holidays!

title: Pool Maintenance Notice
body_md:
The swimming pool will be closed for routine maintenance on **Wednesday, December 18th** from 8 AM to 2 PM.

We apologize for any inconvenience. The pool will reopen at 2 PM the same day.

title: New Year's Eve Community Party
body_md:
Join us for a **New Year's Eve Community Celebration**!

**When**: December 31st, 8 PM - 1 AM
**Where**: Community Room
**What**: Live music, refreshments, and a countdown to 2025!

RSVP required - limited to 50 residents. Contact the office to reserve your spot.

title: Security Reminder: Package Delivery
body_md:
**Security Reminder**

With the holiday season approaching, we're seeing an increase in package deliveries.

Please remember:
- Don't leave packages unattended in common areas
- Report suspicious activity immediately
- Use the secure package room when available

Stay safe and happy holidays!

title: New Seasonal Menu Available
body_md:
**Winter Seasonal Menu Now Available!**

Our restaurant is excited to introduce our new winter seasonal menu featuring:

- Hearty soups and stews
- Roasted seasonal vegetables
- Warm desserts and hot beverages

Available daily from 7 AM to 11 PM. Book your table in advance!

title: Office Holiday Hours
body_md:
**Holiday Office Hours**

During the holiday season, our office hours will be:

- **Dec 24**: 9 AM - 2 PM
- **Dec 25**: Closed
- **Dec 26**: 10 AM - 4 PM
- **Dec 31**: 9 AM - 2 PM
- **Jan 1**: Closed
- **Jan 2**: Regular hours resume

Meeting rooms remain available for booking during open hours.
